EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_HK_CloudNative Workshop_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Hong Kong. Please see event details below:
Date & Location
Date: 13-Oct-2016 Time: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Location: Jardine OneSolution Office <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Jardine+OneSolution+(2001)+Sdn.+Bhd./@3.098425,101.5886131,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x31cc4c3dc3155687:0x5e27d6ecdca0470f!8m2!3d3.0984196!4d101.5908018]]> Address: 19/F, Tower One, Millennium City 1, 388 Kwun Tong Road, Kowloon, HONG KONG
{{my.Save the Date}}
Agenda
8:00–9:00 AM Register and Breakfast*
9:00–9:45 AM Overview of Cloud Native architecture
9:45–10:30 AM Introduction to Pivotal Cloud Foundry
10:30–10:45 AM Break
10:45 AM–12:00 PM Hands-on experience with PCF (push, bind, scale, monitor)
12:00–12:45 PM Lunch* and Networking
12:45–1:45 PM Overview of Spring Boot and Spring Cloud
1:45–3:30 PM Hands-on experience developing Spring Boot and Spring Cloud applications
3:30–4:00 PM Wrap Up, Q/A, Feedback
*Prior to the event you will be contacted to confirm if you have dietary restrictions.
Speakers
- Hin Lam, Platform Architect - Derrick Wong, Platform Architect
Prerequisites
A laptop is required if you intend to participate in the hands-on labs. All other required software will be installed during the labs.
